Contact Me

Get in touch

To schedule a call or get more information about my service please fill out the form. I will get back to you within 24 hours to schedule a call. For urgent requests please call me at 416-829-5334.

Location: I am located in the east end of Toronto, in the Riverdale area. My office is located on the Bloor-Danforth Subway line and is easy to access from any area of Toronto.
